Articles.Content:
(Fairly) simple and straight forward challenge.

You must build a space station and put in into circular orbit around Kerbin (extra points if Mun). Does not matter what radius of the orbit.

Can only use stock parts and Probodobodyne Probe Kit (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6397)

I am including this mod because it has solar panels, and struts that allow one to place parts horizontally, instead of vertically.

No plugins, cfg edits, stuff like that.

Now, for some time I was tinkering with placing space stations into orbit, but quite often I would run into trouble. Either there was not enough trust, or not enough fuel, or the station would end up whirling around itself and breaking apart. So, I want to see what ideas other people have.

Now, I was not successful at launching a station just using the stock + Probe kit, but here is one of the stations I was testing.
I have a station that uses the BACE mod as well as the Probodobodyne Probe Kit. Is that acceptable?

Any mods count.

I am just wondering in the designs.
Challenge accepted would u like a vid or pics?

Any format. Later on I will upload some of my latest ideas.

Yeah, it\'s less of a challenge and more of 'look what I did here'.
Haha alright sounds cool, although i will be using all standard issue parts. Im a vanilla player
What mods are you using for the solar panels?

Great ;D

But one of the struts ends in vacuum...

Great ;D

But one of the struts ends in vacuum...

both of them were attached to another stage, and for some weird reason they refused to cooperate like regular struts >_>

I actually ended up having extra fuel, which I dumped around Mun.
